howQuick.question: How quickly can I plan a weekend trip?
howQuick.answer: You can have a complete weekend itinerary in about 15 minutes. Just enter your destination, dates, and budget — our AI handles the rest. Perfect for those spontaneous Friday afternoon decisions.

nearbyTrips.question: Can MonkeyTravel suggest nearby weekend destinations?
nearbyTrips.answer: Yes! MonkeyTravel supports over 180 destinations worldwide. Whether you want a quick road trip to a nearby city or a short flight getaway, you'll get a fully planned weekend experience.

tripLength.question: Does it only work for 2-day weekends?
tripLength.answer: Not at all. MonkeyTravel works great for classic 2-day weekends, long 3-day weekends, and even extended 4-day breaks. The AI adapts the itinerary to fit your exact dates.

budgetWeekend.question: How do I plan a weekend trip on a budget?
budgetWeekend.answer: MonkeyTravel offers three budget tiers for every trip: Budget, Balanced, and Premium. Choose the Budget tier to get an amazing weekend experience with affordable restaurants, free attractions, and wallet-friendly activities.

groupWeekend.question: Can I plan a weekend trip with friends?
groupWeekend.answer: Absolutely. Share your weekend itinerary with friends, let everyone vote on activities, and reach consensus with built-in group planning tools. No more endless group chat debates about what to do.

isFree.question: Is the weekend trip planner really free?
isFree.answer: Yes, MonkeyTravel is 100% free. Create unlimited weekend itineraries, invite friends, compare budget options — all without paying a cent. No credit card, no trial period, no hidden fees.
